segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating quite a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's too focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being quite clever, sneaking cookies while she's distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit envious of their bravery, climbing on that stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I would have been too scared to do something like that when I was their age.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be enjoying the thrill of getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what kind of cookies they're trying to get.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they're good cookies, worth the risk of getting into trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really turn off the faucet and pay attention to the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She might be surprised to see what they're up to.
segments.speaker: PAR
